body_html: @byronyi , I meet tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.UnavailableError: Cannot bind to rdma://10.9.38.144:50543 error, gist log. I also meet tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.UnavailableError: Cannot find pinned memory region error, gist log. I meet error everytime.
body_text: @byronyi , I meet tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.UnavailableError: Cannot bind to rdma://10.9.38.144:50543 error, gist log. I also meet tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.UnavailableError: Cannot find pinned memory region error, gist log. I meet error everytime.
body: @byronyi , I meet `tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.UnavailableError: Cannot bind to rdma://10.9.38.144:50543` error, [gist log](https://gist.github.com/suiyuan2009/1c7f54908b121227d01914548ffe3bdb#file-gdr-patch-test-L16). I also meet `tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.UnavailableError: Cannot find pinned memory region` error, [gist log](https://gist.github.com/suiyuan2009/1c7f54908b121227d01914548ffe3bdb#file-gdr-patch-test-L249). I meet error everytime.
